solution_line_template: There are a total of {games_played} + {games_left} = <<{games_played}+{games_left}={total_games_season}>>{total_games_season} games in the entire season.
Sixty-four percent of these games is {total_games_season} x {target_win_percentage} = {target_wins}.
Since they already won {games_already_won}, then the team needs to win {target_wins} - {games_already_won} = <<{target_wins}-{games_already_won}={games_to_win}>>{games_to_win} more games.
